services.title: Custom Application Development
services.description: I help with the creation and development of online or offline applications, with a particular focus on aesthetics and user experience.

services.title: Web Application Development Design
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: Blockchain Development
services.description: Leveraging my extensive knowledge in blockchain technology, I offer cryptocurrency programming services to integrate secure and efficient crypto solutions into your digital assets.

services.title: AI Engineering
services.description: Using advanced machine learning techniques, I deliver AI engineering services to solve complex problems, enhance your business operations and drive innovation in your products or platforms.

aboutpara: With a decade-long journey in software engineering, I've honed my skills in mobile and web application development, creating captivating digital experiences that drive business growth. My proficiency extends into the realm of AI engineering, where I apply advanced machine learning algorithms to solve complex problems. Alongside, my extensive knowledge and practical programming experience in the world of cryptocurrencies, driven by my passion for blockchain technology, further strengthens my ability to contribute significantly to innovative projects. This blend of knowledge, skills, and passion underscores my commitment to collective success and technological innovation.

education.universityPara: I started with learning Java, advanced to Python and web development since they are inside my interests. Took courses about Data Structure and Algorithms, Databases, various team project classes. However I moved to Turkey and I am currently a senior in Istanbul Okan University..
